content: **knitted shawl in drops air the piece is worked top down in stocking stitch with an i-cord edge ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ai-425 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** height measured down the middle = approx 31 cm width measured along the top = approx 86 cm **yarn** drops air from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50 g colour 39 magenta **needles** drops circular needle size 5 mm length 80 cm **knitting gauge** 17 stitches in width and 22 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
